The elf smiled and gave her rounded stomach a good whack, sending it rippling. "I'm already getting big, huh?" She lifted her belly up as if to show her spirit jut how much larger it now was.
After polishing each dish of pie, Ryhane went from chubby to downright fat all over again. Her thighs started to touch and her breasts easily went up 3 or 4 cup sizes. Her belly and rear was her largest assets at this point, each dominating her figure. Ryhane flicked some loose hair from her eyes to further admire her smooth purple curves. "Soooo, what did you have in mind?" Ryhane questioned lazily, trying her best to check out her smooth rump. "Besides eating, at least."
The spirit took a moment to respond, going over which specific goals he wanted to accomplish with this host...
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: "...Yeah, let's do something else."

choices: The Spirit fed Ryhane in her sleep, fattening her up even more.
The Spirit invaded Ryhane's dreams, and made her want to gain weight more.
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
"Oh, you must be so tired, you've been through so much in one day. Especially after all those pies, why don't you just lay your head to rest and we'll find something fun to do tomorrow, hmm?" The spirit offered.
Ryhane, though she didn't feel tired, did know it was rather late.
"Well, I suppose so. Off to bed, I suppose." Ryhane said, flopping her giant belly onto her bed.
She stripped down to her underwear, and covered herself under her sheets, her bed already straining under her weight, but not nearly enough to break just yet.
"Aren't you going to sleep, Spirit?" Ryhane asked.
"Oh, no, I have no use for it. Don't worry, I will not watch you while you sleep, I understand how uncomfortable that could be for you." The spirit explained.
Ryhane nodded, and then yawned as she fell into her slumber.

"Now to initiate part two of my plan..." The spirit muttered maliciously, snickering under his breath.
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: Off to sleep.

choices: Manage to gather something about the dream
Interupted thoughts as something enters
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
Ryhane rolled over in her bed, her eyelids feeling heavier and heavier as the feast she just consumed was still settling in her belly. She couldn't help but start to fall asleep, fighting to keep her eyes open for so long was a battle she'd just lost. Her mind drifted away, and the dreams that would have been normal took a left turn without her. Instead, she was left with the beginnings of as far more vivid one...

Atop an opulent tower she laid, swirling marble and shimmering gold surrounding her, Ryhane looked down at a shining city, one that felt oddly familiar. But as she looked down at herself, she felt oddly unsatisfied. She was slim and trim, toned even. For some reason, Ryhane felt rather sad at this revelation, a rumble of hunger growing inside her. Another strange note the mage made was that she wasn't her usual self, she was someone else; light skin and a lavishly gold trimmed dress, leaving little to the imagination. But even with all these strange occurrences, Ryhane only had one question for herself, "Do I never eat? I'm hungry beyond belief!"

She wasn't entirely sure why she said that, but it was on her mind. She heard feet behind her, adjusting herself to see who was coming. The man that appeared was clad in less than comparable attire, someone she assumed was a servant. "Ah good, you caught ear of my words," Ryhanes brow calmed as she turned her gaze back to the city below, "Fetch me a feast worthy of a court."

The man before her bowed in respect, "Y-Yes ma'am.." His voice seemed taken aback by such an odd request, but he complied, his tired feet running back down the steps.

Ryhane sighed, as if on auto-pilot she sat back with her body seemingly making all the calls. Despite her mind being clouded in the dream, she couldn't help but feel like she was reliving something, something perhaps older than she herself was. Part of her mind was focusing as best it could to see through this 'dream', whilst the other was driving her forward...
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: Seeding the Desire

choices: She smells a delicious aroma in the air.
Someone enters the room.
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
As she waits for the food to arrive, she takes note of the location she's in. It seems oddly familiar, as if she's been in a similar room before.
It is reminiscent of Night Elf Architecture, with various patterns and designs sprawling across the walls and ceiling, having a glossy tone to it.

The banners bear the emblem of what she assumed to be the emblem of a high-ranking family in society, with the outline of a graceful tiger drawn on it.
"What is this place...?" She wondered. She tried looking for any windows, but to find the only source of light came from the candelabras scattered across the table in front of her.

She then took note of what she was wearing, it was a purple and yellow stitched robe, elegant and classy. However it felt very baggy on her, as if it was made for a much larger woman. Ryhane dismissed this though, however, and got back to questioning.

But before she can continue thinking...
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: Manage to gather something about the dream

choices: Ryhane's body converses with the elf, while she tries to piece it together
After a short chat, a dinner bell is rung, interrupting Ryhane's fact finding.
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
As Ryhane tried to figure out her sudden change in scenery and attire, a knock was heard through the door. "My Lady, may I receive entry?" A man's voice echoed, amplified by the room's size. "I'm here to report on my progress." He seemed stern and professional in tone. And just as last time, Ryhane was caught unable to act on her own, watching instead for now.

Ryhane raised her hand, in a beckoning motion, "Come in, come in." Ryhane's own voice had a slight undertone of excitement as she called. The servants at the end of the room bowed in respect, each swinging open an intricately carved door. A slight gust of wind from the motion caught the candles, the flames recoiling in Ryhane's direction. She raised her head, maintaining a stern composure at the elf in front of her. He wore plated armor, shining in the candle light as he strode towards Ryhane at the head of the large dining table, his cloak following behind.

"It's good to see you again, my lady." He bowed politely before Ryhane, a smile on his face. "But I'm here to report the progress that I've made in regards to your safety and the overall sanctity of these grounds, as I've stated."

"Straight to the business as always Mr. Darkfeather, but a pleasure none the less." Ryhane smiled gesturing for him to rise, "Now, give your report, I'm eager to see what you've come up with." She said, her eagerness peaking its head based on her swift words.

The man rose from his bowing posture, straightening up his back, "The traps are nearly finished, each are as promised and will not kill those caught. The bulk of them will leave the target slowed and... Persuades the intruder not to continue their pursuit." The elf seemed proud, his blue eyes looking at Ryhane expectantly.

"I'm beyond relieved, Darkfeather, I think I'll finally be able to sleep peacefully in my own home." Ryhane placed a hand over her chest thoughtfully, "I think you've more than earned a spot at my table tonight, come, sit!" She gestured, the elf complying and pulling a chair. "I could use some company, especially one so accomplished as yourself." She straightened her robe to fit better, as she rubbed her hands over her midsection, her stomach was only slightly bigger than before. She seemed to be a good 10 pounds heavier than when she first entered the dream on the balcony, the sudden switch must've been a time skip of some sort. "Now, tell me more about these..."
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: A Visitor Comes Knocking

choices: Ryhane awoke from the dream, very hungry and wanting food.
The dream continues, it appears this feast was only an appetizer!

Before Ryhane can speak, she hears the sound of a small bell being rung. The doors fly open to reveal a plethora of foods, all delicious and, above all, filling.
"Mmm..." Ryhane drooled, the sight of the food dismissing any questions or concerns regarding the situation. For some reason, all she could think of was eating the food.
"Aha... I'll let you enjoy your meal, Madame." The man spoke, bowing before turning around and leaving the elf to her business.

Ryhane took a bite out of the food, and instantly loved it, and began devouring all the food quickly. As she ate, her dress felt more and more tight on her body, as her body was gaining weight rather quickly. However Ryhane did not mind, and continued eating her feast.
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: After a short chat, a dinner bell is rung, inte...

choices: Waking up ravenous
Ryhane's dream belly rumbled
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
Ryhane continued eating, despite her tight middle reaching it's limits. Her elegant dress started to feel tight around the middle, she looked down for only a moment, noticing a deepening divot in her dress for her belly button. "I must give compliments to the chef, his craft is especially exquisite tonight!" She notes, holding up a finger before continuing her feast.

By the time she'd eaten it all, Ryhane sat back in her throne, rubbing either side of her taut middle. "*Urp* I may have overdone it a bit..." She groaned, feeling the stitches strain on the sides.

"My queen! The main course has arrived!" A voice heralded, the doors opening once more for another round of servants carrying trays of food entered. The smell carrying down the hall enchantingly.

"Preposterous, I've already eaten!" Ryhane scoffed, another belch escaping her mouth.

"Hmm? This is the only feast for the night?" Her herald asked, questioning.

"Then... what did I just eat?" She wondered, now recalling the strange looking servants who previously brought dinner. "I-I must have had something else then... who sent me that meal?" She called, her herald not responding. "Just... bring it back to the kitchen, I'm not feeling well..." Ryhane waved them off... till she caught smell of the meal. "On second thought, just serve it, but most will return uneaten."

Ryhane sat back up in her throne as the servants laid the table, licking her lips instinctively, "Just a bite." She reassured, nodding her head...


What started as a small bite ended up being a full on feeding frenzy, zealously wolfing down every morsel. By the time she was finished, she was laying back once more. IF she felt stuffed earlier, this was a whole 'nother feeling entirely. She felt about to burst.

"Ughhh... what was in that food..." She groaned, rubbing her almost comically stuffed middle. She reached as much as she could with her hands, doing her best to tame it's aching. Ryhane could tell that some magic was involved, even in her dream's body.
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: A Primer

choices: The Spirit did not respond, and it was apparent that he was gone.
The Spirit responded, and encouraged her to eat a large breakfast.
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
To her surprise, despite how much she'd eaten, her stomach seemed to growl for more.
To which the servants responded, "The Mistress has become too full to keep eating, yet her stomach hungers for more! Everyone, help in feeding her!"
"No, wai- OHMPH!" Ryhane tried to stop them, but it was of no use. The Servants were all feeding her, her belly growing large with food, yet never revealing itself to be full.
Ryhane kept gaining, and gaining, her belly growing more and more close to the point of popping, yet the servants continued.

Soon, Ryhane's dress ripped at the seams. Her body had grown so much in fat, that she'd outgrown her chair as well, and broke that, too.
"Mpph, pleashe, shtop, I beg you!" Ryhane tries to plead in between bites.
But then, there is a bright light. It stays for quite a while, until Ryhane looks down at her bloated corpse. But it wasn't hers, it was another elf's...

"The Mistress... she is dead!" One servant cried.
"What shall we do now?" Another questioned.
But just then, the same man whom Ryhane was speaking to appeared.
"I'll take over..." He spoke, in a sinister tone, "As her closest living relative."
The Servants, believing this man, all bowed before him. However Ryhane, somehow, knew this man was lying. She couldn't quite tell how, but she just had to get to the bottom of this. Who was this man?

Ryhane then awoke from her slumber, still at the same obese weight she was when she was awake last night.
"Oough, I had a horrible dream..." Ryhane states, rubbing her temple.
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: Ryhane's dream belly rumbled

choices: Find a way to find the spirit, again

1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
Ryhane groggily rubbed her eyes, trying her best to get the sleep out. "How long was i asleep?" She groaned, her words course as she brushed a hand through her frizzed hair, "Spirit?" She called, waiting for an answer. She sat confused, wondering why the otherwise sassy spirit wasn't listening or gone, "You uh... There?" Ryhane peeped, a bit worried. After a few more minutes of waiting, Ryhane came to the realization that the spirit was in fact gone, the cold silence a big defendant if that.

"Hmmmm... Where'd you go off to..." She huffed, looking around the room as if he weren't a spirit, "I need to tell you about my dream," she paused to flip over her pillows and sheets, "I have a weird feeling you know something about it..." Her search turning up spiritless. "Hmmph." She pouted, thinking of what she should do next.
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: A Missing Spirit

Conjure some goodies at home.

Ryhane felt a mighty roar come from her belly, she was hungry again.
Since she could not as well ignore it to find some Spirit, she decided to deal with breakfast first. Besides, the Spirit would be back eventually. She knew it would, and if not, she didn't mind, either.
Ryhane rushed downstairs to find some food, and was saddened to see her fridge nearly void of anything good. Just basic materials for other food, but not enough to cook them.

Ryhane considered what she could do for substitute, and finally decided to...
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: Forget him!

choices: Arrive after Nyla
Arrive before Nyla
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
Ryhane sat at the kitchen table in thought, on one hand she could stay in and gorge on summoned treats, on another, she could go out and stuff her face with real food. Both get the job done. The treats were all delicious, but something about a fresh meal at the inn was the most appealing. Despite having sinfully delicious treats at the flick of a wrist, Ryhane still loved a hand cooked meal. It always felt more filling and full of... Care? Either way, she set her mind to it, nodding to herself. "Ohhh, I bet Nyla would want to come! I bet it'd be fun to show her how big I've gotten too!" Ryhand announced giddily, gesturing for a small arcane servant to appear. It glowed a bright purplish-pink, shape akin to a voidwalker. As the little guy was being formed, she hastily scrawled an informal invitation to her friend, asking her to come with to the local tavern for breakfast.

Ryhane smiled, handing the magic construct the note, informing it exactly where to go before it scuttled off on jets of arcane wind. "I'll deserve us a table before the normal rush..." She gave herself a verbal note before getting dressed and ready for the occasion.
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: I Deserve To Splurge!

choices: Ryhane goes to practice some spells.
The Spirit returns!
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
She decided to come a bit later than the date she'd set, just to allow Nyla some time to find them a spot. She was always better at getting the best seats, away from all the drunkards and horn-dogs.
Ryhane entered the tavern in a tunic and linen pants, something simple, not too fancy. It also showed off the gut she'd gained the other night, it jiggling around freely as she searched for her friend.
Nyla noticed Ryhane, and waved her over to a corner of the Tavern, away from other people.

"Hey, Ny! How's it going?" Ryhane greeted.
"Oh, hey, Ryhane. Listen I've been meaning to talk with you for a while..."
"Me too. So, I went to Dire Maul the other day, and I found this crazy spirit down in some ancient ruins beneath those ruins! He's pretty cool, I wish you could've seen him the other day."
"Yeah, about that. I think you've been eating a bit more... voraciously then normal, and I was wondering if..."
Nyla was interrupted again, "Yeah, I know. But honestly, it's not that big a deal. I mean, what's a few extra pounds?"
"A few extra pounds? Ryhane, you're my friend, but I gotta be honest, this is like a few HUNDRED pounds."
"Oh, come on, Nyla. It's not that big a deal..."
"Yeah, I guess you're right. I mean, at long as you're healthy, what's the harm?"

Ryhane and Nyla chatted about other things the rest of that morning, Ryhane and Nyla eating similarly proportioned meals. This made Nyla believe that yesterday, Ryhane was just a bit shocked from her journey to Dire Maul, but now she was alright.

"Well, Ryhane, it was real nice catching up with you. But, I got to get to work. Boss says I can't be late again, or Maevoril will take my spot..."
"Maevoril? Isn't he that really bitter, depressed guy?"
"It's how you know my boss is REALLY serious about getting into work on time. Anyway, see you later!"
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: Arrive after Nyla

choices: Conjuring a bit of a snack... with a mistake

1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
Ryhane decided it was probably for the best that Nyla left so early. She really needed to practice her spells, especially after hardly using any for a few weeks now, other than conjuring food and teleporting to save energy. Training in the arcane was much like any other form, its about exercising the related 'muscle'. The young mage knew she was falling a bit weak in that regard, so a day of practice should bring her back up to speed, or so she reasoned...

Opening the door to her tower, Ryhane grabbed her staff and spell tomes, even bringing some spell reagents just in case. Ryhane brought all her supplies over to the training courtyard that many adventurers often went to hone their skills. This morning it was somewhat empty, which she was thankful for, spare a misguided frostbolt freezes someone. "Alright, start of nice and easy..." The fat elf took the time to meditate beforehand and she was ready.

Her training started off easy, no hitches or anything. Simple destruction spells and wards. She continued training with bolts and the like till she worked up a good sweat, drinking from a flask of conjured water, "Whew... Shouldn't have sluffed off so much!" Ryhane grunted, patting her round and doughy belly. She continued on till she threw everything in the book at it's intended target (A somehow indestructible dummy), no misfires or anything. Proudly, Ryhane struck a pose before plopping down on a nearby atone bench, her cushioned rear softening its otherwise uncomfortable nature. The elf wiped at her forehead, feeling exhausted and rather hungry by the mid-afternoon shed arrived at.

"Alright! Time for a well deserved snack!" Ryhane announced, rubbing her palms together..
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: Practice makes perfect?

choices: Ryhane only ate half of the food, her underwear barely staying on her fat frame.
Ryhane ate the whole 25 person meal, very obese and needing a change of clothes.

The spell is complete, but she see's she's accidentally created a meal fit for an entire group of 25 people.
"Well... surely, I couldn't eat all of this, but I did use up all my mana, so..." Ryhane considered, rubbing her gut.

She couldn't hold back, and dove into the Mage Table, devouring all the food present on the table. She gained weight all throughout the process, getting fatter and fatter.
"Mmm... this food is tastier than I thought! I need more..." She thought, eating more of the treats. She was beginning to rip out of her clothing, her underwear becoming more and more visible. But it seemed as if Ryhane was oblivious to this, only wanting to eat more food.

By the time Ryhane had finished eating...

1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
The tubby mage swallowed the final bite of a thick pie, licking her lips until a belch escaped her lips. With the spirit gone, Ryhane's appetite wasn't bottomless, but still much bigger than the average person's. She managed to clear half the table, her clothes shredding off after the 10th serving or two. With the spirit's essence still lingering in a trace on Ryhane, the food did indeed pile into fat; gaining at least 80 pounds. It wad the straw that broke the camel's back on her change of already tight clothes. The fat elf sat engorged on the bench, hiccuping from her large meal, "Ughhh... Way too much..." She murmured, stifling another small burp.

Standing up, Ryhane was amazed her underwear didn't pop off right then and there, but they stood together. An adventurer couldn't help but stare with mouth agape, a detail Ryhane didn't notice as she cradled her bloated belly. She picked up her staff and books, cramming them in her bag quickly before she attracted too much attention. She moved as quickly as her belly allowed her, using the staff to aid her, its oaken timber creaking if she leaned too long.

Walking past a patrol of sentinels, Ryhane's face contorted into one of embarrassment, their toned abs on display in complete opposite shape. They couldn't help but stifle a collective giggle at the plump and naked elf running past them, her cheeks a very dark purple. Ryhane rounded the corner to her tower in breakneck speed, running straight inside and slamming the door behind her, landing face first in bed panting heavily. "Elune... Why?" She grunted, biting her face in the soft pillow.

1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
Ryhane heard a knocking on the door, "Excuse me, miss? Open up, I'd like to have a word with you."
Ryhane, worried it might be someone important, ran to get some cover, "U-uhm, coming!"

Oh, no, what if it's a Guard coming to arrest me for running around nude? What if I never come back here, oh this is all that Spirit's fault! Ryhane imagined all the possible scenarios in her head, cursing the spirit for glorifying this obesity. It might've felt nice, but the social implications were just too much to bear for her.
"Miss, I really need to talk with you!" The voice called, it seemed to be in more of a panicked tone than a serious one, and a bit higher than a regular night elf.
She wondered if it was even a guard at all, but nevertheless she responded, "I just need to get some clothes on, please be patient!"
"WE DON'T HAVE TIME FOR PATIENCE, OPEN THE LIGHT FORSAKEN DOOR!" The voice hollered immediately after Ryhane was finished.
Ryhane, startled by the voices sudden tone shift, felt that opening the door would be a good decision. She threw on a towel over her exposed breasts, she managed to find some panties to put on before the voice yelled at her.

When she opened the door, she found no guards, sentinels or night elves at all, just a small Gnome who burst in, leaping onto Ryhane's massive belly.
"How much do you weigh, how much did you eat, WHERE IS HE??" The gnome screamed, frantically questioning Ryhane.
"What do you mean, who are you talking about?" Ryhane asked.
"The spirit! Oh, blast, I forgot his name, but he's like this Night Elf looking guy, who's red and transparent! I recognize this sudden weight gain from anywhere, and this is his doing!"

The Night Elf was confused, "What do you... oh. I think I know who you're talking about, but he's gone now."
The Gnome didn't look any calmer, in fact, he was even more freaked out than before.
"Oh, NO! NO NO NO! This is not good, if we don't find him fast, all of Azeroth is DOOMED!"
"Doomed? Doomed as in how?"
"Ugh... let me explain..."

~5 hours of explanation later...~

"...And that's when I trapped the sucker in the Ruins, and left without ever looking back! I made the labyrinth SPECIFICALLY to keep people from finding the hiding room of the Spirit, but apparently you found it with quite ease."
"So, basically he's a Spirit who fattens up women to death?"
"Precisely! However it appears as if he's just up and left you, but I'm certain he shall return. If he does, no matter what, do NOT let him take over your free will! Keep him from making you any fatter! In fact, let me weigh you right now..."
The Gnome pulls out a Gnomish Weight Machine, and plops it on the ground. Ryhane steps on it, and it instantly shoots up to 450 pounds.
"Goodness Gracious! Well, it's good I found you when I did. If you reach 600 pounds of weight, he'll have full control and fatten you up to no end!"
"Oh, my! Thank you for warning me, Mr...?"
"Alvin Whirlcog, and you?"
"Ryhane Starleaf. Again, thank you for the information."
"Anytime! Anyway, I'll see you tomorrow!"

That night...
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: Knock Knock, open up!

1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
Ryhane knew the spirit would be coming, preparing a calming tea that would keep her focus up. When he came was the biggest question, and she needed to be prepared as best she could for it. The elf looked down at her frame as the tea begun boiling under an open flame. "450, huh?" She grabbed her meaty belly, squeezing and kneading it, "Sounds about right." The fattened elf continued to prod at her form with mixed feelings.

As the tea came to a boiling point, Ryhane pulled it away from the fire and suffocated it. Her mind wandered as she poured the tea, drifting back to that dream from the night before. A shiver went down her spine, there's no way she'd let herself end up like that. She needed to stay strong. Ryhane poured a large cup, waiting for it too cool before sipping. Before she knew it, she downed the full cup, her worries still not put to rest. She decided to pour the rest of her kettle, sipping away till there was none left.

A side effect Ryhane overlooked was that with calmness, comes sleepiness. Laying back in the pillows of her bed didn't help her either as the effects kicked in. Shen was calm and focused, but very much slipping into a deep slumber. The cup she'd just finished rolled from her hand, landing in her sheets, a slight snore coming from her. The dreams started off normal for her, but within the hour, the spirit came phasing his head through the door with a grin. "Heh, home sweet home..." he rubbed his spectral palms together, hopping into Ryhane's head.

The calming tea kept Ryhane from relinquishing full control, but eventually his influence slipped into her dreams, their nature slowly shifting as a side effect to his entry...

Inside the dream, Ryhane...

The dream continues as normal for a while longer.
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.content:
Ryhane dreamed as a beautifully thin woman, dressed in an elegant gown. She was at a party of sorts with all the high-class nobility, clinking wine glasses and conversing about their lives.
Ryhane was then approached by a well-dressed Elf, who asked if she wanted to dance, to which she agreed. The two went onto the floor, and waltzed to the tune of the music for gods know how long. The elf whispered beautiful compliments to Ryhane as they danced, him complimenting her slim figure and beautifully long hair.

After a while, they both retired to some chairs near the snack bar. The elf asked if Ryhane wanted anything to eat, to which she declined.
"Oh, come now. You're wasting away, you need to have something."
"Oh, and I thought my physique was impeccable, as you so delicately put it."
"Oh, you do, but starving yourself is no way to gain such beauty."
Ryhane smiled, and decided she'd have a small snack for now, just so he'd be quiet.

She was given a slice of bread, which she picked off pieces of while she watched the others enjoy the party.
The other elf sat down, joining her viewing. "Quite a party, eh?"
"Oh, yes. I've never been to such a party as this, but it's going wonderfully as a first time."
"Well, I'm glad you're enjoying it." The elf smiled, putting his hand on her lap.
Ryhane blushed, taking another bite of the bread.
1141321121211131111121121121212112111122.title: Was a thin young woman

The dream continues in such a way, only growing in intensity...

Ryhane did her best to look away from the charming man sitting beside her, feeling flustered. She nervously nibbled on the last of her snack. As she finished off the meager bit of bread, she felt the man rub her shoulder, "Allow me." As soon as Ryhane turned around, she was met with the man leading a slice of cake to her mouth, "Surely you must try the desert?" He gave her a smile, holding a fork up in front of her face.

"I suppose I can have just a bite..." Ryhane caved, eating the cake off the utensil. It melted in her mouth, practically begging to be eaten. Ryhane accepted another fork-full, giving the man a smile. Soon she found herself opening her mouth for more every time she swallowed the previous bite. "Mmph, it's absolutely exquisite!" Ryhane mused, losing herself in the desert's fine taste. Oddly enough, it just kept coming, he didn't even need to cut another slice...

Ryhane continues to eat, and fails to notice her weight increasing. All she was set on was the delicious cake, and eating it all. She didn't even notice when each cake slice was getting bigger, and she had to take more bites per slice, causing a faster gain.
"Mmfh, shnom, oh, this is so delicious..." She said, her dress ripping at the seams.
"Yes, eat. You are so thin, you need to eat SOMEthing." The man repeated, in his smooth, manipulative voice.

She soon grew as fat as she was awake, and was stripped down to her underwear, but she kept eating, happily oblivious. Each Cake Slice was now the size of a Bowling Ball, and she just kept scarfing it down, eating it all.

She kept growing, her underwear somehow managing to stay comfortably on her despite her large size. Her butt now took up three chairs, but she still refused to believe she was fat.
The Elf continued to compliment her, and make her ignore the weight she was gaining.

The dream soon ended, and as soon as Ryhane woke up...

Ryhane woke slowly with a groan. She rubbed at her forehead, "Ughh, I don't even remember falling asleep." She sat up slowly, wiping away at the sweat on her forehead and fanning off her chest. The dream really exhausted her, despite the fact she was sleeping. Her stomach growled as she noticed the time, "Slept late again..." Ryhane sighed, rubbing her growling belly slowly, "Let's get you fed..." Stumbling out of bed she made her way to the kitchen, checking all of her food supplies. Nothing beyond basic cooking ingredients, and nothing she could just eat. With a shrug, she figured she'd just summon some grub. Conveniently forgetting the gnome's advice, Ryhane conjured up a large tray of sweets for her little breakfast.

Laying back in her cushioned couch, Ryhane levitated sweets to her mouth and ate slowly, relishing in their taste. "Not bad." She shrugged, snapping her fingers for another tray to poof up beside her.

The spirit made Ryhane increase the portions of the food she summoned, in a similar fashion as in the dream so that she didn't grow suspicious. She kept eating as happily as she was in the dream.
Ryhane was growing fatter, her fat soon enveloping all of the couch space. She just couldn't stop, though.
Her clothing began to rip and tear, causing her fat to spread out further. The spirit made sure her digestion was nearly instant, so she would be fatter much quicker.

It was only a matter of time until Ryhane realized what she was doing, and it was when she was about to scarf down a large cake.
She grasped at her fat belly, now over twice the size it was earlier. She sighed, poking and shaking it, wondering what she would do.

Alvin Whirlcog returned to her, and noticed her big belly.
"So, I suppose ignoring the Spirit didn't work, hm?" Alvin mentioned, after inspecting her gut.
"No, and it's getting worse. Today, I nearly ate an entire cake after eating a whole mealsworth of treats!" Ryhane explained.
"Hm, there's only one thing left, then..." Alvin sighed reluctantly, wishing it hadn't had to come to this...

"You're gonna have to return from where you got into this mess." The gnome nodded, "There's still hope that you can make peace, but Dire Maul is the only location tuned enough for these spirits to even consider leaving you alone." Whirl of paced back and forth, shaking a finger, "And even then! Its a gamble." Alvin looks to Ryhane's eyes, "Best bring out your best bargaining skills! The ball's in their court, as the humans say." The gnome nodded in affirmation, crossing his arms with a huff.

The elf in question thought for a moment before saying anything; how would she even come close to bargaining with an ancient elven usurper? She shrugged, rippling her large physique every which way, "So... What could they possibly want in return for freeing me? It sounds like they're pretty vengeful to me." Ryhane pursed her lips in thought, "Judging on the dreams alone, the spirit sounds like he's determined." Now hopefully he wasn't able to listen in on all this...

Whirlcog drummed their fingers together, "Well... There's two options that stand out here. One: Find other spirits that aren't a fan of the one inside you, two: You find them a new host and sweeten the deal. The second option is well... A bit mean, but you're the one who will have to deal with it haunting your conscious."

11512.content:
Sikana the female draenai leaned back in her chair and gave a triumphant burp. She had just finished off 3 orders of Spiced wolf steak and was absolutely stuffed. "I've got to cut down to only 2 dishes per meal," Sikana admitted to herself apon noticing that her greedy blue belly was sticking out from underneath of her favorite brown linen shirt. "Azeroth's food is having a strange effect on my body." She reached down and grabbed her love handles, a bulging curve of flesh that felt warm to touch, "I seem to be growing larger" she thought to herself.

Sikana was beautiful, from her amber eyes, to her heart shaped face, Her breasts were round and full, and strained at the linen stiches on the shirt she wore around town, perky despite their size. Until recently her stomach had been flat and toned, with the hints of abs under her light blue skin. Weeks of gorging on Azeroth's cuisine had pushed her slightly softer stomach out into a pot belly, which was fast developing into a heavy gut that hung over the waistband of her pants. Sikana sighed a little as she looked down at empty plates that were placed in front of her. Since her people arrived on Azeroth, Sikana has been overwhelmed by the varied tastes of the food, on Draenor meals were only eaten to ensure survival and the food was quite bland, so weight gain was a foreign concept to her.

"Would you like to order dessert?" The waiter asked politely, catching Sikana off guard. "No thank you, I couldn't possibly eat another bit...-" Sikana gets cut off by a loud grumble from her stomach.

"Well I guess I am a little hungry..."

choices: Wake up and attempt to cut back
Give in and disregard the side effects
115121.content:
Sikana adjusted herself to a more comfortable position, unclasping her brown leather belt. She sighed before answering the waiter, "I'll have a slice of your chocolate cake, it looks absolutely delicious," the waiter simply nodding, "Right away ma'am, it should only be a moment." Sikana looked down at her plump middle, now fully on display without the bely holding it back. She patted it with a sigh, "After tonight, I'm going to cut back on all this Azerothian food, I don't want to grow too big, else I won't be able to move!"
The waiter came back rather quickly with a large slice of what looked to be the richest and most decadent chocolate cake in all of Stormwind, layers of fluffy cake cemented together by thick layers of chocolate cream. The waiter placed the massive slice in front of the over-fed draenei with a smile, "Enjoy!" Sikana stared wide-eyed, "I didn't want such a large piece... surely I couldn't eat such a thing..." but the waiter had already left as she trailed off. This would be her first tasting of such a treat, as she adored the dozen donuts she had ordered the other night, her craving for chocolate had certainly grown. She bit her lower lip, silverware in hand, "This is the last time I indulge myself..."
Within 10 minutes, the blue glutten managed to make quite the display for onlookers. Her already stuffed middle straining to fit the elekk sized portion of cake, she unbuttoned her tight pants and belching under her breath. Within the first few bites, Sikana was enthralled by the taste, pushing past the ache in her stomach to polish the plate.
The draenei sat back in her chair, licking the plate clean of any chocolate left. At this point, she was the last patron left in the eating area of the inn. She, opens her coin purse and pays her bill, thanking the waiter. She had some trouble getting up the stairs to her room, stuffed to the brim. She unlocked the door and laid on the bed, lulled to sleep by her feast.

Before she went to bed the night before, she hadn't bothered to change out of her clothes from her outing at one of Stormwind's finest inns, she could barely fit into her garments, tight pants ripping at the seams and linen shirts on it's last button. She didn't want to make a complete fool out of herself, deciding to eat what she could at home. She lumbered down the steps if almost in a spell, lulled on by the idea of stuffing herself silly.

Sikana walked into the kitchen and opened the larder, glad that she stocked up on Azerothian snack-food the day before. She arranged her smorgasbord of junk food before her, licking her lips and giving her larger gut a shake, "This looks like a start, hmm?"

Sikana tore into her junk food with extreme gusto, shoving whole handfuls of the decadence at a time, no longer in fear of embarrassment from onlookers, she could care less how she looked. Within a few minutes, the last button on her tunic popped off, leaving her middle completely bare, her bra holding onto a tiny bit of her decency. She decided her pants were much too constrictive for her meal, pulling them down in a huff, her underwear once preserving modesty now looking like a tight band of fabric over her plump bubble of a rear.

Within the hour, all of her sweet snacks were stuffed in her gullet, leaving her a bit stuffed, she gives out a belch, licking her fingers clean. "Almost as good as my dream.." Sikana thought.
11512121.title: A feast for the fat draenei

choices: A large, fattening meal!
A smaller, less-fattening meal.
115121212.content:
Sikana had finished all the food in her house, her belly now easily twice the size it was before she binged, but she still felt hungry.
"Funny... even after I ate all that, my belly hungers for more... well, the stomach knows what it wants!" Sikana concluded, heading up to her room to find some clothes to wear.

She decided on a half-shirt, that only covered the upper half of her body, revealing her already massive gut, and some large, red linen pants. She opened the door and headed to Azeroth's finest Buffet.

On the way, she had plenty of others take second glances at her large belly. Nobody mentioned it, but the stares did most of the talking. However, Sikana was making a beeline for the buffet, and nobody in the right mind would stop her.
She finally arrived, and when she did, she was greeted with a very cheery Dwarf, who gladly showed her to her table. It was pretty early in the morning, so not many people showed up. All the more for Sikana to eat, though.

She heads towards the food aisles, and decides to start with...
115121212.title: To the Buffet!

choices: Option 1
Option 2
1151212121.content:
... A large feast. She rationalized that if she was going to eat at a buffet, she may as well get what she pays for. As she comes up to the food isle, she grabs three plates, preferring to grab it all in one go, saving herself the trouble of going up for seconds.

The line was short, but seemed painfully long to the overfed draenei, rubbing her growling stomach hungrily. "Quiet down, I'll feed you in a momen.." She eyed the assortment of dishes in front of her, cuisine from every corner of Azeroth and beyond, some even from her home on Draenor (Which she stuck her tongue at in displeasure). She decided to indulge herself in Human food, as it was the most filling and her favorite since coming here. She was getting closer to the front of the line, strategically scouting out which food will land on her plate.

Sikana mapped out her plates, a bit of Wolf Steak here, a bit of Meat Pie there, some large Elwynn sausage links, and a large pile of Lordaeron fries. But she wasn't one to skip out on dessert, oh no. She burdened her final plate with a full chocolate pie, in memory of her chocolate gorging the previous night.
She sat down and arranged the plates in front of her with a look of bliss in her eyes, "Cutting back certainly would have been an awful mistake!" giggling before digging in.

As if a woman possessed, Sikana greedily tore into the food, hardly giving herself the chance to breath. Each mouthful a new sensation, eager to try the next. If one of the patrons were to look closely, they could notice the draenei's stomach stretching to contain her meal, wich was quickly disappearing. With only a second of thought, Sikana got to work on her pie, eating it quicker than the cake the night before, the dwarf who greated her watched on with a worried expression.

After all was said and done, Sikana truly couldn't eat another bite, buffet patrons looking at the stuffed draenei in confusion, never before seeing one of her people at such a weight. She hic-up'd in her seat, glad to see she ate enough to fill a family of 4 to the brim, all in one buffet payment.

"T-thank ye, ma'am... come back any time?" The dwarf host stuttered, awed by how much she could eat, especially with her choice of clothing, It was easily seen.

Option 1: An onlooker has a strange fascination with Sikana...
Option 2: She sleeps off her latest binge, with more strange dreams...
1151212121.title: A large, fattening meal!

choices: Decides to stay in today, and go out tomorrow.
Decides she needs to go outside and get new clothes.
11512121212.content:
Sikana headed home, and rested her massive belly on her plush bed. The bed was nearly the size of her belly, and her fat even seeped off the edge a slight bit, but Sikana ignored this and fell asleep.

She had another dream, but this time she was about 5 times the size she is now, as well as bedridden and immobile. She stuffs herself with large cakes, cookies, and other such pastries, the crumbs falling into her massive cleavage, which is bare open. Even though she is immobile and heavy, she still felt happiness.

She awakens, sad to see her dreams had not come to a reality. Yet.
Sikana weighs herself, and the numbers show 550 pounds. Her belly was huge, as well as the rest of her body. One part of her told her that this wasn't right, and that she should lose this weight. But another LARGE part of her told her otherwise.
Sikana put on her largest shirt and pants, and even those were too tight. She decided that today, if she wanted to return outside into society, would need to get bigger clothes.

Her fat body jiggles with each small movement, and Sikana felt the constricting clothes slowing her down.
Sikana...
11512121212.title: Dreams

choices: Mysterious Stranger
Something else entirely!
115121212122.content:
... left to go shopping for new clothes, these simply wouldn't do! She pulled at her tunic, still not able to pull it down enough to cover herself. Part of her was starting to question what was going on, it seemed almost unnatural at this point, before she had managed maybe a dozen pounds every other week... but this? Something surely must be acting on her from somewhere. But she dismissed those thoughts at the idea of getting new clothes, these were just dismal!

Sikana heard of a new boutique in Ironforge that was having a rather large opening sale, that might also have the clothes big enough for her. She left her house in stride, unnaturally well on her hooves, given her size. Every inch of her new figure shaking and jiggling every which way, noted by the murmurs of passing citizens, The draenei made her way to the dwarven tram system, to luckily find a train had just arrived. She seated herself on two of the(notably small and gnome sized) chairs, the sides of her rear going over either side, plump tail laying out lazily (Even her tail ring had grown too small for the expanded woman, having popped off in her sleep last night).

The journey still took a god two hours, even at the quick speed the Gnomes managed to create, it still traveled half the continent after all. The rather bored draenei drifted into a nap part way through, just as vivid as the last few, her dream was of the same fair, fatter than she was, eating delicious food and the like. But this one was slightly different, as there seemed to be a pair of hands feeding her and rubbing her belly, she couldn't tell who it was, but it felt heavenly... before waking to a loud buzzer as the tram screeched to a halt at Ironforge.

With a little effort, she got up from her seat and followed her map to the Dwarven boutique she originally set out for. Along the way, as has been rather common lately, onlookers ogled the strange sight in front of them, 'That's a HUGE lass!', a dwarf noted, 'By the light, that's a big goat!', a human pointed, 'Someone's certainly well-fed...', another mentioned. None of these insults seemed to bother Sikana as she strut to her destination, aptly arriving with minimal confusion.

Before her was a rather large two tiered store, with a dwarven woman greeting the draenei as she entered, "Our... plus size section is upstairs, come to me if you have any questions." She nodded, skipping past the 'skinny' section on the bottom floor and going straight for the plus sized bit.

"Ahhhh, perfect...", Sikana eyed the garments all around her, happily seeing a wide array of clothes, from elegant gowns to lounging robes. Still shocked they're in her size, she made a quick bee line to the comfortable clothes, thinking back to her dreams, a smile appearing on her face. "Oooo, they even have that new 'gnomish elastic band' clothes!" Hanging several sizes over her fore-arm, she shopped knowing she'd grow in the near future, grabbing clothes for now, and then.

The splurging and shop-happy Sikana made her way to the payment desk, laying out several full outfits ranging from large to, well massive. "Are you sure you want bigger sizes, these first few should be more than fine for your current physique?", asked the lady at the counter, wondering if she was making a mistake.

"No, no. I'll be needing them soon enough." Sikana dismissed her and paid for her clothes, walking out the store with her spoils.

Option 1: Go home for a quick snack and rest, perhaps find out who the stranger in her dream was?
Option 2: Something else entirely!
115121212122.title: Much needed shopping...

choices: It was her Master, who tried to convince her to stop her gain.
It was someone who wanted to help Sikana gain, and grow larger.
1151212121221.content:
Sikana had a "Small" snack (Which consisted of just a a whole cake), and went to bed.
This time, when she went to bed, she was actually thin. Her old body from her old planet had returned to her, and she was confused.
She saw a figure in the distance...
1151212121221.title: Mysterious Stranger

choices: A note?
The stranger herself
11512121212212.content:
A female silhouette came in to view, a... night elf, by the look of it? Her dream was rather vivid, a purple elf with long ears and strange facial tattoos, certainly an elf of the Alliance then. She heard a voice in her head, 'You may not know who I am, but I've been watching your arrival, with... interest, since you arrived here in azeroth.' The figure came closer into view, only about a head shorter than the draenei, with a similar build to her old body, toned and well managed, clearly someone who took care of herself.

'Who are you, stranger? Do you have anything to do with what's been happening to me?' Sikana questioned, seeing the stranger walk closer clad in an elegant robe, fit for Kaldorei nobles.

'You could certainly say that, yes. I've been helping you along with these strange dreams you've been having, and the consequences there of. I have an interest in you, actually'

'An interest, of what kind?' The draenei questioned, seeing that she had a cake in hand, glowing with some sort of magical property.

'You see, I stopped in the Stormwind inn a few weeks ago, noting a certain young woman walking in, clearly not accustomed to the food here indulging in sweets.' She stops in front of the draenei with a slice being brought up to her mouth.

'You've been watching me, wh-' Sikana is cut off by the cake being stuffed in her mouth, which she chews quickly.

'Well, living as long as I have, very few things excite me anymore, and I'm in search of something new to toy with, which you look like a perfect candidate for' She pauses to cut another slice, happily feeding it to the draenei as Sikana's dream-body grows with plumpness after each bite. Growing from thin and toned to chubby with a potbelly and thick love handles, much like she was at the inn, not too long ago...

As Sikana was fed, she could hardly protest to what was going on as the stranger continued, 'I'd like to see you larger, much larger! I've never had the chance to do anything of the sort, but you certainly seemed open to the idea after the first dream I've given you.' She gave the draenei yet another slice, plumping her up a notch bigger, pot belly and bubble butt blooming to a gut and large backside.

'I've been giving you these dreams and imbuing you with magic these past few days, I'm sure you've noted how unnatural it is to gain so much in such a short time?' Half the cake now inside Sikana's belly, she was looking about the size she was this morning.

'So, what do you say?' She tilted her head at her with a smile. She simply replied with a nod, the taste of the dream cake almost impossible to resist. 'Good then, I'll see you tonight after your nap, no?' She shoves the remaining half of the cake inside Sikana's mouth, ballooning her to double her size, sitting on a massive rear, smooth to the touch, a belly pinning her to the ground and a chest that she couldn't see past... Just before the dream ended, waking up to find...
11512121212212.title: Help?

choices: Sikana gives into her hunger and meets the Elf outside.
Sikana has a change of heart, and decides to decline the Elf's offer.
115121212122121.content:
Sikana noticed a note on the side of her bed, and it was tied to a box. The contents of the box were an assortment of Chocolates, and the note reading...

Roaring Stomach,
It calls in dismay,
'Feed me, o master!'
And I must obey.
The hunger, it slowly
drives me insane
and allows me to be
who I am today.


It was a strange poem, to say the least. Sikana ate the chocolates, as she read the back of the note.

'If you wish to follow your passion, meet the hooded elf at the back of the inn. I will be waiting at Noon today, and if you do not show, I shall assume your answer declined. Meet me, and I will allow you to experience delights only known by royalty.


It was currently 9:30, so Sikana still had some time to think about her answer.
"I love eating the food here, but... there's still something telling me this is wrong. What should I do..." Sikana wondered...
115121212122121.title: A note?

choices: Somewhere Sikana's never seen
Someplace Sikana knows... but different
1151212121221211.content:
"This elf is surely powerful... especially after what's happened these last few days, that much is certain." She thought to herself. "And the offer is just too good to pass up..." She second guessed herself again, "Perhaps this elf is trying to trick me, as she certainly seems overly interested..." Sikana pops another chocolate into her mouth, dismissing the 'foolish' notion that she might be tricked. "I'll meet her, what could she possibly do that would make things worse?" She slipped into her newest set of gnomish elastic band garments, stretching even further than her current figure, there was room for growth. After getting dressed, she pampered herself up with a bit of make-up and filed her hooves, she did want to look the part if a noble was interested in her.

Once done prettying herself up, she noted there was about an hour and a half before her 'appointment', Sikana gave a sigh, hoping the time would go by swiftly. Either way, she's dying to know what this Night elf wants with her, or whatever will happen, whether that be god or bad. She walked around the Stormwind streets anxiously, staying close to the inn. Grabbing something to quell her stomach was a needed amenity.

Time had come for her meeting, Sikana raced between the thought of being there slightly early, or a bit late? Maybe she'll think I'm overly anxious, or perhaps too hasty? She trotted behind the alley, watching behind her shoulder to make sure she was alone, she turned around the corner to the back of the inn, unlit, but enough starlight to reveal the silhouette from her dreams. The elf had a hood covering her eyes, the draenei slowly came closer with the note in hand. "I was told to meet here?"

The figure turned to her eyes giving an arcane glow, clearly this was the same woman. "Ah, so good of you to come, I was worried you wouldn't show up! The temptation must've been too much, no?" She elf spoke quickly, as if she was filled with excitement. And just as Sikana was about to respond, the she-elf took her by the hand, "Surely you're dying to get started, yes?" She tugged at Sikana's arm and opened a portal, to where was unkown, the elf bringing the surpised blue draenei in tow...
1151212121221211.title: Too good to pass up

choices: Amenia feeds Sikana now.
Sikana wants to take advantage of this later.
11512121212212111.content:
The area the Elf took Sikana was an area entirely covered in roots and leaves. It was about as large as Stormwind itself, with a whole river system flowing in a magnificent pattern on the ground, leading towards the middle of the room, which both Sikana and the Elf stood.
The Elf finally removed her hood, and revealed her identity. "I am Amenia Mistdew, and I am a Kaldorien Mage. For many years, I've searched for one who I can share my wondrous gift with, and now... I believe I've found her." Amenia explained.
Before Sikana could ask anything, Amenia continued, "As you probably know, I am not an ordinary Mage. I have a certain... lust, for lack of better word, towards feeding those with large appetites food beyond their comprehension. However, when I attempt to find the perfect candidate, they shrug it off, and continue their average lives. This makes it rather... difficult. But now, I've found you. Being a non-native to this land, I could easily manipulate you to enjoy Azeroth's food over your old planet's food. The Dreams were merely icing on the cake, to make sure you stuck to your obese lifestyle.
"This is my dimension I've created. It's easy to see that it's very barren, however I can create whatever I wish in this world..." She demonstrates by creating a large cake, offering it to Sikana.
Sikana takes a slice, and takes a large bite from it.
"Since you've agreed, you've agreed to join me in my Dimension, I've deemed Kyrola, to be fed with only the best food, and so you may gain as much as you desire."
Sikana, now hearing this, began to raise some questions. "This is a wonderful gift, Amenia, but... will I ever get to see the outside world again?"
"Of course, Sikana. I couldn't ask you to isolate yourself for my own personal enjoyment... I shall merely provide you this world, as well as my talents, to feed you as much as you want, whenever you want. However, of course... the longer, and larger, the better." Amenia explained.

"So, Sikana... are you hungry?"
11512121212212111.title: A strange, new place.

choices: Sikana asks to get on to the feeding
Ask something different Amenia
115121212122121112.content:
"Well..." Sikana's belly growled loudly, "I am... but I'd like to know more of this place, it's like nowhere I've ever seen before, from Azeroth to my homeland, it's soooo beautiful!" She looked around in wonder, awestruck by the massive plane of strange origin.

"It's only fair you know what's been given to you, I suppose." Amenia tapped at her lips, thinking of where to start, "Well, it's an ancient technique of magic that's known to very few magisters, living or dead. It's spawned with massive energy, creating a... pocket almost of space, that can be infinitely large, based on however I will it." Sikana listened intently, casually munching on the summoned cake, Amenia conjuring a plush seat beneath her with a snap of her fingers, "Please, sit. I essentially create a pocket of space that only takes up a tiny bit of real space back in Azeroth, which I keep very protected, as you would imagine..." She brings forth her own seat and a cup of tea to sip on. "You see, I can do anything I will here, craft an entire city scape, change anything about it. I can alter whatever's inside, only limited by my imagination!"

Miss Mistdew went on for a good hour, explaining exactly how her little world works, and the significance of sharing it with someone. "This is a dying breed of magic, and I doubt you'll ever see another like it, foolish mages locking themselves inside or causing it to collapse, you can only imagine what some half-wits have done to ruin their little pockets. But you needn't worry, I'm far more clever." She looked at Sikana across from here, noting that she absently ate a good third of the giant cake just listening to her go on. "You truly were lucky to have been brought here, oh what fun we'll have!" Amenia exclaims, "Anything you want, just tell me.."
115121212122121112.title: Not quite yet

choices: Sikana gets down to the feeding.
Another question.
Sikana isn't ready yet, and wishes to leave to do a few things.
1151212121221211122.content:
"Miss Mistdew..." Sikana started, but was cut off momentarily by Amenia, "Please, call me Ami."
"Yes, Ami. Why do you get such a joy out of fattening others? This is your world, what's stopping you from simply feeding yourself silly?" Sikana wondered.
"Well, Sikana... I've wondered that myself. I've fed myself to impossible weights, to sizes only giants know, and yet I felt empty. I could not bear to simply be doomed to an eternity of immobile blobiness myself, there had to be someone else out there who loved being fed and fattened as I... Do you know how long I've searched?"
Sinaka shook her head.
"Well over a hundred years. Until you show up, with such an amazing appetite, I simply couldn't just let you be lost."
"Well, why not just ask?" Sikana asked.
"I was afraid of you rejecting me... It is a big leap. To go from one world, to another... Obviously, you'd understand my hesitation to show you. I had to be sure you were okay with the gain, and when you proved more then happy, I entered you in a dream and now here we are."
Sikana felt both empathy, as well as friendly joy towards Ami's story.

"So... Any more questions?" Ami asked Sikana.
1151212121221211122.title: Ask something different Amenia

choices: Something sinister shows itself in Ami...
All is well, and the two continue their feast
11512121212212111221.content:
Sikana smiled warmly, "I think my curiosity is sated... though my appetite surely isn't now!" The two exchanged laughs, now on equal footing.

Ami reassured her, "And again, anything you want, and anything you don't want, do tell." With a snap of the fingers, their surroundings were shifted to a warm room, ornate in nature, but rather comfortable. Pillows scatter the floor, a heavenly aroma filling the air. "Now, the main course, shall we?" A smorgasbord of food was brought in, almost straining the floating tray it came delivered in, filled to the brim with all of the delicacies of this world, and who knows where else. Sikana's jaw practically drops in awe...

Time seems to disappear as the two go on with the feeding, Sikana filled infinitely with food, surely the work of Ami, her clothes were replaced with an elegant dress, fitted no matter her size. Were this the real world, she'd have popped from all this! Ami, causally sipped on tea and watched, occasionally hand feeding the greedy Draenei with pleasure. "It seems you've grown accustomed to you surroundings, young one, enjoying yourself?"

Her patron nodded, clearly too busy with her feast to answer her with words. Surely this must feel like her dreams, but she agreed that this was better, she needn't fear anything, she could leave any way she wanted, or any time she wanted. Clearly this was a dream come true...
11512121212212111221.title: It's a start

choices: Ami slows down the food, wanting to speak with Sikana.
Ami waits, plotting her next move carefully. It's not yet time...
115121212122121112211.content:
Ami began to caress Sikana's many fat folds, but this didn't bother Sikana. She simply continued to eat and eat, and gain more weight as she did.

"I'll be back in a moment, My fatty goat, you." She said, in a cutesy fashion.
Sikana nodded her fat-enveloped head, as Ami left the dimension for a moment to meet with someone.
She popped into a dark room, bleak and depressing. With only a single candle illuminating the area.

"Is she... pacified?" A shadowy figure asks Ami.
"Yes, and growing nicely. She bought the bait, now all we need to do is wait."

The shadowy figure grew agitated. "I've done my waiting, Elf. Whether or not you bring her to me... I'll be feasting either way." The figure, slowly revealing himself from the shadows, was shown to be a Forsaken Male.
"Of course, Master. I'll have her here as soon as I am able." Ami then teleports away, back to where Sikana is still feasting on an infinite amount of food.
115121212122121112211.title: Something sinister shows itself in Ami...

choices: Sikana questions her patron (at the best of her abilites)
Blissfully ignorant
1151212121221211122111.content:
Ami returned to the blimped up draenei, happy to see that she's grown even bigger since her outing. "I'm back from my errands, little one! How're we doing?" She patted her belly with a smug grin, though there was certainly some genuine care in her eyes.

"Mmm, perfect..." She managed, barely able to move at all, her chubby cheeks making the task a bit more difficult.

A tinge of legitimate care came over, she's enjoyed the short time she's had with the 'cute wittle goat' and part of her doesn't want to see her go... the other knows that she has a price to pay. Her options being weighed in her head. "Aww, perfect! Anything I can get for you?" She questioned, either way her motives at the moment were the same.

Sikana shook her head, she was absolutely perfect, like a living version of her dreams! She had noticed something different with the tone on Ami's voice however, something was off... maybe some errands she's rather not talk about?
1151212121221211122111.title: Something's off...

choices: Ami decides to stick with Siraka, and face her Undead Master's Wrath.
Ami decides that her job with her Undead Master is too important to risk.
11512121212212111221112.content:
Sikana came to the conclusion that, if something were important enough, Ami would say something. She has been given no indication to not trust Ami, and besides, she was living a dream in reality, and she was happy.
Ami noted that Sikana, for a moment, felt that Ami might be holding something back. But when she went back to her eating, Ami sighed in relief, then asked another question,
"Sikana..." Ami wondered.
"Mmp yeah?" Sikana replied through bites.
"...Nevermind. I'm going to go for a walk in reality, I'll be back." Ami said, in a somewhat depressed manner.
Sikana felt that something was going on, but even If there was, what could she do to help? She's a fat and immobile blob. So Sikana continued gaining.


"I need to tell her.. This is wrong..." Ami thought, as she paced around Stormwind.
"I need to think of what's more important, my future... Or my Happiness..."
11512121212212111221112.title: Blissfully ignorant

choices: Good things don't last forever!
A while goes by without the wrath of Ami's master...
115121212122121112211121.content:
Ami was at her ends, she wasn't kidding about waiting so long for someone to join her, but she knew that her master wouldn't let her get away with a betrayal. She thought back on Sikana, she was clearly blissfully ignorant, and with such happiness in her eyes! Could she leave that?

"Bah, I just can't do it... I'll have to find a way to make up for this, or something, but I can't let that little butterball be taken by him." Ami went with her own personal happiness, she'll find a way to make up for it, right? She opened back up her portal after 15 minutes of assuring herself on what she was doing.

Ami came through her rift to a sleeping Sikana, "Oh she is just precious when she sleeps..." she coos, nuzzling her face into her hands. "I suppose I did make the right choice, I wouldn't be able to live with myself if I had fed her to the wolves, just look at that face!" Ami explains, conjuring a giant feather bed for Sikana and placing her on top. She nuzzled into the side of her 'little' goat with a light yawn...
115121212122121112211121.title: Hapiness?

choices: Aemi breaks free from Mordekai, and interrupts his actions.
1151212121221211122111211.content:
A loud explosion disturbs the two, and a large smoke cloud appears in front of them. The dimension begins to rip and tear, the bed beginning to fade away, so they both fall onto a hard, cold ground.
"So, little Ami thinks she can get away with betrayal, Hm...?" The figure states, appearing from the smoke cloud.
"No..." Ami mutters.
Skidana is completely confused as to what is going on, and is totally speechless.
"Oh, precious Skidana... How blissfully ignorant you wished to stay, despite evidence of something amiss was right in front of your eyes." The Forsaken explains.
"What are you talking about? Who are you?" Skidana asks.
"I think the better question is... Who is your friend, Ami? AMI, Come out here!"
The Forsaken teleports Ami to his location, "Well, Ami? Tell her. Who are you?"
Ami stays silent, but speaks when the Forsaken slams his foot on he ground, "Aemillien! I'm not a Night elf... I'm a Blood Elf, and I've been helping my Master, Mordekai, with his studies. I hoped, one day, I could create my own dimension, like this... This isn't even mine, it's all his... I'm sorry..."
Mordekai laughs, "And now, the truth is out. But now that you know, I shall do what Aemi could not..." He then pulls out a gun towards Skidana's head, "Farewell... Skidana."
1151212121221211122111211.title: Good things don't last forever!

choices: Tailed by the Syndicate...
Free for now...
11512121212212111221112111.content:
Aemi jumps to the rescue, shoving his weapon to the side just as the shot rings out. A large hole left ripped through the way behind the immobile draenei. "Oh that's it, you're out of chances..." Mordekai pulls a sidearm from his leg and draws it on the elf with outlandish speed, but a mere second before his rotting finger could pull back the trigger enough, Aemi conjures a block of ice around him.

Sikana could hardly follow what was going on, let alone what just happened in front of her. "So... you were tricking me from the beginning, is that right?" She managed, finding herself at a loss of words.

"Well.. yes. I was." With a quick hand gesture, a rail thin blood elf with Scarlet eyes and golden locks stood before the draenei, a tiny fraction of her size. "I've been working with him to make a pocket world of my own, as he possesses the resources and means to build one, which is more than you know. Don't even ask what my end of the deal was, I'm through with it." She sat down with a slump, "Be mad at me if you will, but I'll do my best to make up for it."

Sikana believed her, especially after the flashy iceblock trick, she was inclined to believe her. "That means whoever he works with will be after the both of us now, doesn't it...?"

"Oh yes, they'll see to it that they have what they want, It always works out that way..." Aemi didn't look very hopeful about the outcome... Mordecai's syndicate still plans on having it's feast, though it might involve a draenei AND blood elf.

"I'm afraid you'll have to be a more manageable size for now..." Aemi snaps her fingers, instantly snapping the draenei into a chubby size, which from her previous bulk was a large change, landing harshly on the ground.

"Coulda made it a bit lest painful..." Sikana said, rubbing her bubble of a rump.

With no time to spare, the two ladies hopped through a summoned portal...
11512121212212111221112111.title: Redemption

choices: Aemi's POV
Sikana's POV
See what Mordekai's plotting.
115121212122121112211121112.content:
They both speed through dimensions, but end up in the real world, within the Golden City of Silvermoon, at an room in an Inn.
"In the rush, I couldn't send us to anywhere else more... safe. But for now, this'll be the best place to lay low." Aemi explained.
Sikana, still befuddled by the whole situation, tried to regain her senses and asked, "So... mind explaining to me what's going on? What's this Syndicate?"

"Alright, let me explain...
"Ever since the Forsaken began, a group of outcasts, known as the Fleshbound Syndicate, took in a few wanderers in the dark alleys of cities, and using their abilities, promising riches beyond their comprehension. They are led under the rule of Mordekai, a soulless Forsaken Arcanist who feels no remorse, pity or emotions of any kind. Par for the course of Forsaken, but he's much different.
"Mordekai found me just a few weeks ago, at a Bar. He offered me a deal I couldn't refuse, he claimed to be a teacher of the Arcane, and wanted me to be his Protege. I was astonished that such a person would want to associate themselves with me, it felt too good to be true. However, I had to complete a simple task for him...
I needed to find him a meal. But not any meal, an exotic, juicy and taste so great, that it couldn't compare to any of the meals he'd had prior.
So, until a few days ago, I'd searched for the perfect specimen. Until I found you, and you accepted the gain much quicker than I'd imagined. I even sped up the process, to see how far I could take it before you grew suspicious.
Luckily enough, though, you just went along with it. I visited you in a dream, a borrowed talent from Mordekai, and, well... you know the rest."

Sikana nodded, mostly understanding, "So, now Mordekai sent out an Assassin to take us out, hm?"
Aemi nodded, "Yeah, so I'll keep a lookout. You can stay here, if you want, I can conjure up some food to keep you busy while I'm gone."
Sikana shook her head, "I'm sorry, I'm not hungry right now. I'm a bit worried, to be honest..."
"Don't be." Aemi tried to comfort Sikana, "I'll keep you safe until my Magic can allow for me to try to get us to my personal Dimension, then we won't have to worry about the Syndicate."

Aemi winks and heads downstairs, in the same robes she wore when she brought Sikana to Mordekai's Dimension.
115121212122121112211121112.title: Free for now...

choices: Aemi's PoV
Sikana's PoV
1151212121221211122111211123.content:
In a dark corner of the Undercity, a particularly fowl and rotted Mordecai sat in a ruined seat, picking his teeth with a small bone, "What's the news? How goes my meal preparations?" He gestures to the forsaken on his right, clutching a report from the assassin.

After a short hacking cough, "Ahem, it appears your blood elf agent has gone rogue, foolishly defying you and running off with the main course." He hands the parchment to his master.

"I knew that knife-ear didn't have it in her, but running off with the meal?! That can't happen..." He growled through gritted teeth before regaining his composure, We have a contingency plan, one I had hoped not to use, but so it must be done." The magister stood from his seat slowly, walking to the railing overlooking the entire operation. "There's been a bit of a double crossing, and we can't have that, my best trackers, find them. Any spies you need, I'll give to you." He gestures over to the forsaken working on refurbishing their hideout, "And you, build the contraption I brought schematics in for... make it for two, actually."

He turns to his informant, "Perhaps it's better this way... dinner for two?" Mordecai broke into hysterics, clearly pleased with his awful joke.

"No no, I believe it's a dinner OF two, sir." The informant corrected.

"Please tell me why In hired you?" The syndicate boss rolled his eyes, he ruined the moment.
1151212121221211122111211123.title: Schemes a brewing

choices: Sikana, but much larger. She must've found some food up here.
A Syndicate assassin, attempting to capture Sikana, but she put up a fight.
11512121212212111221112111231.content:
Aemi ordered a glass of Eversong Wine. The portal wouldn't be ready until tomorrow, she blew most of her mana on that daring escape from earlier.
"Oh, why'd I ever do this... I knew I should've just stuck with my studies." She scorns herself, but she remembered Sikana. Her plump, fat-loving Blue Blob... "I suppose this isn't all too bad... just need to wait for a while longer."

Aemi finished her wine, and decided she'd check up on Sikana. She headed up the stairs, only to find...
11512121212212111221112111231.title: Aemi's PoV

choices: Spying and prying
Lying low and plotting their next move.
115121212122121112211121112311.content:
She headed up the stairs, only to find... much more of her companion. As soon as the door creeped open, Sikana belched triumphantly, cheeks covered in powdered sugar. "Sikana! How did you even find my stash of sweets?!" She whispered, in a rather... loud tone. Clearly her alterations on the draenei's ability to grow weren't halted since leaving the pocket dimension. There couldn't have been more than... one to two cakes, and at least a few dozen Extra Creamy Goblin doughnuts in there (What? She has a sweet tooth sometimes.)!

Sikana was clearly larger. A slightly chunky figure, yes, but not how she was now. Her cute little potbelly formed into a overhanging gut, a large blue fold separating it in half. Her porky thighs weren't helping her situation, prospering her belly up in between, leading to some thick hips and pudgy love handles, cute little rolls notched into either side. And her rump clearly wasn't the same, plush and more luxurious than any seat in Silvermoon, surely. Her plump little tail laying to the side. Her plump little fingers were just finishing off the last donut (Greedy glutton...), leading to her chunky arms, pillowing and perky breasts, and cute chubby cheeks.

Aemi couldn't stay mad at her, being as cute as she is, but had to assert some caution to her. "Well, I can't reverse time, nor your shrunken clothes, but I need to remind you, it's near impossible to find anything of that size in the city of 100 pounds or less." Sikana's clothes... were holding together, her top with all it's button's popped off, belly oozing out, and pants stretched skin tight were looking taxed, but still together. "And you do realize, It's going to hard running from you know... an evil syndicate aiming to capture us?"

Sikana nodded, licking her fingers clean, "I was hungry, an it's your fault keeping this here." She defended. rubbing her exposed middle.

*Sigh* "With that logic I can hardly fight you on that. Aemi laid next to Sikana, who clearly took a liking to it's luxurious sheets. "Just try and control yourself, you overfed goat." She smiled, closing her eyes for some rest.
115121212122121112211121112311.title: Sikana, but much larger. She must've found ...

choices: Sikana!
The Innkeeper!
1151212121221211122111211123111.content:
One of the Assassins sent by Mordekai, little to the two runaway's knowing, was spying on them, hiding among the shadows. Waiting to make his next move.

He simply sat there while the two rested, for many hours. Waiting for the perfect opportunity, until he found it. Sikana rolled off the bed, possibly sleepwalking, and headed downstairs to do gods know what. But that was little of the Assassin's worries at the moment, the hardest target by far would be the Magic-wielding trigger-happy Elf, who's conveniently still asleep.
He slipped out of the shadows into the slightly more revealing darkness, with a bludgeon in one hand, he prepared to knock out Aemi.

But before he could do the deed, the lights flashed on, revealing himself. It was...
1151212121221211122111211123111.title: Back to the Syndicate

choices: Not so fast! Capture evaded
Waking up to a missing companion
11512121212212111221112111231111.content:
It was... an overfed blue she-goat, with a bounty of food in hand. Someone sleepwalked into the larder, by the looks of it... Her eyes were closed, but her dream must've been potent, because Sikana was snacking on a pastry as she walked back to bed (Right past the would-be kidnapper).

She laid down on the bed with an audible creek, still munching on her grab. Now was his chance, if that cow could sleep eat, there's no way she'll wake up. The spy shrugged his dead shoulders and raised his arm high...
11512121212212111221112111231111.title: Sikana!

choices: "Why are you with that fat Goat thing?"
"Why'd that guy come after you?"
115121212122121112211121112311111.content:
But just as the Kidnapper was about to leave, he was stopped by a male elf, who told him to put Aemi back, and there would be no troubles.
"Listen, mate. I have more right to say that to you then me, so why don't you just-" The Assassin was cut short when the Innkeeper cast a freezing bolt, that froze him in his place. He freed the captive elf, and laid her back to bed. As for the Forsaken, he'd take care of personally.

The next morning, Aemi woke up to a throbbing headache. "Oooghh, what happened last night...?" She wondered.
She looked around, and saw her fat Draenei friend chewing on something. It wasn't hard to assume what, since evidence of plenty of foods were all around her friend's side of the bed.
Aemi headed downstairs, and ordered a warm cup of coffee, rubbing her head, still under some pressure.
That's when the Male elf from last night met her, "Morning, sleepyhead. Rough night?"
She immediately recognized the voice and face of her old friend, Catsen.
"Heya, Cat. Fancy seeing you here." Aemi said jokingly.
"Noticed you had a Headache. Think I should mention some guy tried to sneak into your room and kidnap you, and probably your friend. Of course, I came in and saved the day. Used the Magic skills you and me learned during our Lessons." Cat heroicly stated.
"Oh, Cat, I missed your lack of humbleness. Always wanting to be the hero..." Aemi trailed off into her own thoughts.
